segments.text: I went to the beach with my friends and had a barbecue there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a lot of fun . Did you go swimming , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I think it ’ s a fantastic place to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I couldn ’ t agree more . That ’ s an ideal place for a vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t wait to go there myself .
segments.speaker: S1
